page.title: 05EDUCATION-PLAYGROUP
page.content: Twenty four pre_school children (17 boys and 7 girls) go to the playgroup each weekday morning from 0915 to 1215.The group meets in the hall behind St.Richard's church and it costs 95p per child each day.Four adults look after the children and encourage them in pre_reading and number skills. For example,each child's name is printed above its coat peg to help the children recognise their own name.During the morning the children have milk and a biscuit.They take turns to count how many cups of milk and biscuits are needed.There are many toys to play with such as jigsaw puzzles,lego building bricks,4 or 5 tricycles,a rocking horse,model cars and a model garage.The children also enjoy painting pictures.
